name: RPS → ROCK / PAPER / SCISSORS
description:
Test your Reactions Per Second with this Rock Paper Scissors based game.

Made in a single morning in the lead up to the A Game By It's Cover Jam 2020 as I'm excited to participate again this year and had missed it last year.

Based on a My Famicase Exhibition 2017 cartridge design by Dan Clarke (@Arkotypeco on Twitter).

Controls

Rock → R / X / Left
Paper → P / A / Down
Scissors  → S / B / Right
